TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains values used as identifiers by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent ElementAddedToSelectionEvent

Docs.summary: Identifies the event raised when an item is added to a collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the result of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> must be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent

Docs.summary: Identifies the event raised when an item is removed from a collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the result of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent ElementSelectedEvent

Docs.summary: Identifies the event that is raised when a single item is selected (causing all previously selected items to become deselected).

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the result of either an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is more than one selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> event is raised.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
